Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: It tastes like a rotting log.#$b#I love it!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)746: Hmm, a new pet. It shall become a great mushroom companion!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)891: My kind shall rise to consume the world!#$b#Thank you @. I will make sure this little sporeling thrives.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)432: I wonder what this is made of...
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)851: *Gasp* A smaller me! I shall raise it to be a beacon for all of mushroomkind.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)404: I shall teach this one the ways of the mushroom!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)281: I shall teach this one the ways of the mushroom!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)257: I shall teach this one the ways of the mushroom!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)420: I shall teach this one the ways of the mushroom!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)422: I shall teach this one the ways of the mushroom!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)430: I've never seen a mushroom like this before.#$e#I am excited to learn their ways!
Entries.MovieInvitation: Only if you promise to get me some food!
Entries.rainy: This rain is just what my pustules needed!
Entries.Mon: The surface is pretty cold. I can't wait to go back to my magma pool.
Entries.Tue: Humans have been around for a while, but lots of different species have dominated the world over time.#$e#Mushrooms have been here for all of it.#$e#One day the world will be ours again!
Entries.Wed: Do you think mushrooms grow in space?#$e#I wonder what space mushrooms are like.#$e#Would they have multiple stalks?
Entries.Thu: I've noticed humans collect a lot of mushrooms.#$e#What do they need them for?
Entries.Fri: Doug keeps getting tangled in my mycelium.#$b#I'm trying to train him out of it, but it's slow going.
Entries.Sat: I have discovered that humans will give you food if you enter their homes and look very sad.#$e#I do not intend to use this knowledge responsibly.
Entries.Sun: *Squish* *squish* I fell in a puddle and now I'm all soggy.
